text: Do you have a product that you wish to bring under people’s attention? Is there some kind of service, process, idea, or opinion you want to have heard, but don’t know how? Try animation! title: SUBTITLING
text: Did you know that subtitling is not only used for television and cinema, but also highly requested in social media content for Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn? Considering that the audio on most social media platforms is off by default for video content on autoplay, subtitles can be used to convey your message to the viewer, even without audio and any effort required from the viewer. It also works great for other purposes where audio is often switched off by default, such as corporate narrowcasting. If desired, ARCTIC LIME Solutions is able to assist you with the translation.

text: ARCTIC LIME Solutions is able to assist you with professional translations as well. No matter if it needs to be translated from Dutch to English, or vice-versa; great results guaranteed!

text: Need your files duplicated on a second medium, such as a CD, DVD, Blu-ray, USB Stick, SD card or Hard Drive? ARCTIC LIME is happy to help. We can do it fast and secure. Send an e-mail for the possibilities!

title: DIGITIZATION/UPSCALING
description: Old memories and content brought to 21st century standards!
text: With technology improving rapidly on such a massive scale, many well-known analog media containers such as VHS and DV tapes are becoming less and less common. Let ARCTIC LIME Solutions create digital copies of your memories. You’ll be able to play these back on a lot of different electronic equipment, such as desktop and laptop computers, televisions, smartphones and tablets. Just as with any other type of content, it's possible to even professionally upscale the images in order to fit modern day standards, and if desired, the files can be placed on a hard drive or USB stick. Depending on the original resolution of the footage, enhancements are possible up to Full HD and even 4K resolutions.
